alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Inland Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 3:12PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Hillsborough County through 345 PM EDT... At 311 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Riverview, or 9 miles southwest of Brandon, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fish Hawk, Brandon, Riverview, Palm River-Clair Mel, Boyette, Progress Village, Gibsonton, Lithia Springs State Park, and Bloomingdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
